name: @Nealmalhotra/poke-mcp
description: Query people and interaction transcripts from your PostgreSQL database. Quickly list unique people and retrieve all interactions for any selected person. Stay organized and speed up analysis with fast lookups and flexible result limits.

tools.name: list_people
tools.title: List People
tools.description: List all unique people you have talked to in real life

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: list_interactions_with_person
tools.title: List Interactions with Person
tools.description: Get all interaction transcripts with a specific person by name. This is a list of all the interactions you have had with a person in real life.

name.description: Name of the person to filter interactions by

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return
